Statistical Foundations About Authors Susan Simmons, PhD - Institute for Advanced Analytics @ NC State with special thanks to the contributions from Drs. Aric LaBarr and Shaina Race Structure of the book The book is broken down into small sections that aim to demonstrate a single concept at a time. The companion text, Data Manipulation Techniques with R introduces the foundations of programming in Python and R. This book is a work in progress. Submit any issues here. Please check back frequently for updates. Acknowledgements The authors would like to thank the members of the faculty and the TAs at the Institute for Advanced Analytics for providing feedback on this work.
